page.title: 11MEDIA 2
page.content: Over half the children we interviewed in a survey listened to the radio.Most children listened to{"Wiltshire Radio" (a local independent station). Nearly every adult questioned in our survey listened to the radio.The most popular stations were "Radio 1" and "Radio 4".Adults listened to at least {one hour}of radio each day. The majority of adults in our survey read a{newspaper}every day.The widely read newspapers in order were the "Sun",the "Mirror",the "Daily Mail" and the local paper.The outstandingly {popular Sunday}newspaper was the "News of the World". Over half the adults interviewed read from a book daily.The variety of books read was wide, but included Science Fiction,Romantic,Historic and Classic novels.Most people belonged to a public library.
